abstract: Jennifer Hill, a top executive at the Royal Bank of Scotland and a former Goldman Sachs managing director, will become the chief financial officer for Bank of America Merrill Lynch’s investment bank
snippet: Jennifer Hill, a top executive at the Royal Bank of Scotland and a former Goldman Sachs managing director, will become the chief financial officer for Bank of America Merrill Lynch’s investment bank
lead_paragraph: Jennifer Hill, a top executive at the Royal Bank of Scotland and a former Goldman Sachs managing director, will soon become the chief financial officer for Bank of America Merrill Lynch’s investment bank, according to people familiar with the decision.

headline.main: RBS Executive to Join Bank of America

byline.original: By Ben Protess and Andrew Ross Sorkin
